在技能的有效時限內提高對方的HP上限

恢復施展者周遭限定範圍內的團員HP

Traditional_Chinese: 減少目標所受到的物理和魔法傷害

Traditional_Chinese: 消耗所有的MP來製造最大的傷害

Traditional_Chinese: 召喚熱氣來持續傷害對方

English: A ranged wind attack that pushes the enemy back.
Traditional_Chinese: 施展強大颶風，將對方擊退，有機率減少目標的恢復力

English: Teleports you to a target point within range.
Traditional_Chinese: 使用魔法之風瞬間移動到指定的地點 (指標範圍內)

Traditional_Chinese: 藉助水精靈的力量攻擊敵人，有機會減緩目標的移動速度

English: Damages the enemy with a stone spike that may stun.

集中精神力發動無屬性攻擊

Traditional_Chinese: 自身釋放精神屏障，對周遭的敵人造成傷害。小機率可擊暈目標。

English: Damages the target enemy and enemies surrounding them with a psychic blast.

Traditional_Chinese: 使對方的移動速度降低

Traditional_Chinese: 在溜刃上追加吸血的效果可吸收對方HP，並且提升攻擊力

Traditional_Chinese: 使用溜刃多次打擊敵人

Traditional_Chinese: 用帶有火焰的箭矢射擊，對目標範圍的敵人造成火焰傷害

Traditional_Chinese: 在一定範圍內召喚出火燄，使敵人持續受到傷害

English: You are poisoned, suffering damage over time and reduced HP Restoration.

English: You are stunned and cannot move.

在一段時間內對敵人造成傷害

English: You are chilled, suffering reduced Attack Speed and Casting Speed.
Traditional_Chinese: 降低攻擊速度並增加施法時間
增加攻擊力與攻擊速度

English: Reduces incoming damage by wrapping your body in tree bark.
Traditional_Chinese: 被樹皮保護著，降低對物理的攻擊

English: Damages the target continuously over time.
Traditional_Chinese: 在一定時間內，受到持續性的傷害。

English: Strikes the target with your shield, with a chance to stun. Requires a shield.
Traditional_Chinese: 使用盾牌攻擊目標 有機會對敵人造成暈眩 需要盾牌才可使用

Traditional_Chinese: 強力的單手攻擊，造成敵人傷害的5%將轉化成FP

Traditional_Chinese: 招喚月光讓敵人虛弱，當有此減益技能效果的狀態下，所受的所有傷害都會增加

Traditional_Chinese: 讓怪物不受到暈眩和永久性的負面狀態

English: Empowered by your dragon, gaining increased Attack.
Traditional_Chinese: 龍之恩典喚醒你的攻擊力。

English: Empowered by your lion, gaining increased max HP.
Traditional_Chinese: 獅之恩典喚醒你的健康。

English: Empowered by your tiger, gaining increased Critical Damage.
Traditional_Chinese: 虎之恩典喚醒你的致命傷害。

English: Empowered by your fox, gaining increased Attack and Casting Speed.
Traditional_Chinese: 狐之恩典喚醒你的技能傷害和施法速度。

English: Empowered by your rabbit, gaining increased Speed.
Traditional_Chinese: 兔之恩典喚醒你的速度。

English: Empowered by your griffin, taking reduced Incoming Damage.
Traditional_Chinese: 獅鷲之恩典喚醒了你的來襲傷害減免。

English: Empowered by your unicorn, gaining increased Block.
Traditional_Chinese: 獨角獸之恩典喚醒你的格擋率。

English: Empowered by your angel, gaining increased Critical Damage.
Traditional_Chinese: 天使之恩典喚醒你的致命傷害。

English: Empowered by your king crab, gaining increased Block Penetration.
Traditional_Chinese: 帝王蟹之恩典喚醒你的格擋穿透力

Traditional_Chinese: 一個響亮的呼叫擾亂目標並迫使他們和附近的敵人瞄准你。

Traditional_Chinese: 將從目標玩家受到的傷害轉移到你自己身上。
